text: Table 1: Common hazards in the MRI unit 1. Projectile effect 2. Movement and heating of implantable surgical devices and foreign bodies 3. Effect of metals and other objects on the image quality 4. Thermoregulatory issues: heating and heat loss 5. Monitoring difficulties 6. Minimal patient access 7. MRI chamber pollution by anaesthetic gases 8. Intravenous (IV) contrast agents 9. Noise levels and other physiological effects 10. Quenching of MRI magnets
